column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " You 're right , Korra . "
#Text=Korra says : " I am ? "
#Text=Asami says : " She is ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " It 's true , there will always be new conflicts and enemies to face .
#Text=I know this Kuvira problem is only going to get worse .
#Text=But no matter what happens , no matter how crazy things get , I 'll always try to restore balance .
#Text=" Baraz says : " And that 's when I made a solemn vow never to eat bark - onion soup again .
#Text=Been six years , four months and fourteen days ... Urgh !
#Text=I can still taste it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Does anyone else feel like throwing themselves overboard ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Not me !
#Text=I 've spent the last few hours tuning out all these incredibly boring stories ... " Baraz says : " Hey !
#Text=" Varrick says : " All the while mentally composing the most exciting tale ever told , soon to become the greatest mover ever made !
#Text=I present to you now : Bolin , as Nuktuk , Hero of the South — Trademark Varrimovers International — in the incredible true story of Bolin !
#Text=Hero of the world !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait , am I playing Nuktuk , or is Nuktuk playing me ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Both .
#Text=It 's your true story , but we 'll capitalize on the audience of the Nuktuk franchise .
#Text=Duh !
#Text=" Bolin says : " How can you call me " the hero of the world " ?
#Text=I left my friends and family to join up with a psychotic dictator who imprisoned me and now , I 'm running back home with my tail between my legs .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Nyahbabababab !
#Text=You 're emphasizing the wrong story beads .
#Text=Let me tell it .
#Text=The story of Bolin begins in an exotic port of call .
#Text=A wise sage , the richest merchant in the world , and a handsome devil all sit on a single pillow in the living room of a luxury yacht !
#Text=How do they all fit on one pillow ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ooh !
#Text=Giant pillow !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Wrong !
#Text=They 're all the same man !
#Text=Me !
#Text=I try to teach a swami the power of levitation , but he 's too stupid to understand it , so I kick him out .
#Text=" Upon whom can I bestow my awesome knowledge ? "
#Text=I ask myself .
#Text=Then , in walks Nuktuk , with a twinkle in his eye , a gorgeous dame on his arm , and a song on his lips .
#Text=He bursts into a rapturous melody !
#Text=" Where can I find my teacher ? "
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , come on !
#Text=I was n't singing , you were not levitating , and Asami is just a friend , thank you very much .
#Text=If you want to tell my true story , you should start from when I met Korra .
#Text=She came to the bending arena , one fateful night ... " Korra says : " This place is even more amazing than I imagined !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Name 's Bolin , by the way .
#Text=" Korra says : " Korra .
#Text=" Baraz says : " Bo - ring !
#Text=When does the singing start ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " There was n't any singing !
#Text=" Varrick says : " You 're on - screen talent , kid .
#Text=Leave the storytelling to the masters .
#Text=So , the trouble begins when the Avatar is trapped in the Spirit World .
#Text=The world 's most evil villains realize that with Korra out of the way , the time is right to try to take out Bolin .
#Text=So , the worst of the worst team up .
#Text=They 're led by ... Zaheer , leader of the Red Lotus and master of the skies , a flying chaotic chaos machine !
#Text=He 's joined by ... Vaatu , the ultimate force of pure spirit evil in the universe .
#Text=The biggest , meanest , scariest kite that ever flew !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait !
#Text=Zaheer did n't team up with Vaatu .
#Text=How would that even happen ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " How do you think ?
#Text="
